name: fromJSONToColumnsBlock
description: Deserializes a JSON object into a ColumnsBlock design block instance.

returns.description: A new ColumnsBlock design block instance.

name: fromColumnsBlockToHTML
signature: fromColumnsBlockToHTML(block: IDesignBlock, renderChildBlockToHTML: (block: IDesignBlock) => string): string
description: Serializes a ColumnsBlock design block to an HTML string. Uses a helper callback to recursively render each child block.

params.name: block
params.description: The parent columns block to serialize.

params.name: renderChildBlockToHTML
params.description: Callback to render each child block to HTML.

returns.description: The generated HTML representation of the columns block.

name: fromColumnsBlockToJSON
signature: fromColumnsBlockToJSON(block: IContentBlock, childToJSON: (block: IContentBlock) => object): object
description: Serializes a ColumnsBlock content block to a JSON object. Uses a helper callback to recursively serialize each child block.

params.name: childToJSON
params.description: Callback to serialize each child block.

returns.description: The resulting JSON representation of the columns block.
